name: The Daily Life of a Multiverse Engineer
name_original: The Daily Life of a Multiverse Engineer
description:
Instructions:

  1. Your Objective is to get the power of the city up and running. Collect power chunks and deliver them to a substation to light up that area. Reach the final Power Station to complete the mission. 
  2. Use WASD to move around.
  3. Use SPACE to jump.
  4. Use “F” to change the view / teleport to the parallel universe. (Use this ability to change the view whenever you feel stuck)
